      • isNormalized

        public static boolean isNormalized(double[][] kernel)
        Check if the kernel is normalized. If the sum of elements its approximated equals 1.
        Parameters:
        kernel - Kernel.
        Returns:
        True if is normalized, otherwise false.

      • isSeparable

        public static boolean isSeparable(int[][] kernel)
        Check if the kernel is separable (Separable convolution).
        Parameters:
        kernel - Kernel.
        Returns:
        True if the kernel can be decomposed, otherwise false.
